name: Mahindra Bolero Neo
description: The price of Mahindra Bolero Neo, a 7 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 9.95  - 12.16 Lakh. It is available in 4 variants, with an engine of 1493 cc and a choice of 1 transmission: Manual. Bolero Neo has an NCAP rating of 1 stars and comes with 2 airbags. Mahindra Bolero Neo has a ground clearance of 160 mm  and is available in 6 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 17 kmpl for Bolero Neo.

variants.variant_name: Bolero Neo N4 1493 cc, Diesel, Manual, 100 bhp
